select r.id, r.title as repoTitle, count(q.id) as totalCount, r.category_id as categoryId from t_repo as r join t_question as q on q.repo_id = r.id
r.is_deleted = 0 and r.is_exercise = 1
and r.user_id in
#{uId}
and 1 = 0
and r.title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
and r.category_id = #{categoryId}
group by r.id

select r.id,r.user_id,r.title, sum(case when q.qu_type = 1 and q.is_deleted = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as radioNum, sum(case when q.qu_type = 2 and q.is_deleted = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as multiNum, sum(case when q.qu_type = 3 and q.is_deleted = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as judgeNum,sum(case when q.qu_type = 4 and q.is_deleted = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as saqNum from t_repo as r left join t_question as q on r.id = q.repo_id
r.is_deleted = 0
and r.title like concat('%',#{repoTitle},'%')
and r.user_id = #{userId}
group by r.id,r.title

select * from t_repo r where r.is_deleted = 0 and r.id in (select uer.repo_id from t_user_exercise_record uer where uer.user_id = #{userId})
and r.title like concat('%',#{repoName},'%')
